ğŸ§­ Resumen: Paris is the capital and largest city of France, with an estimated city population of 2,048,472 in an area of 105.4Â km2 (40.7Â sqÂ mi), and a metropolitan population of 13,171,056 as of JanuaryÂ 2025. Located on the river Seine in the centre of the Ãle-de-France region, it is the largest metropolitan area and fourth-most populous city in the European Union (EU). Nicknamed the City of Light, partly because of its role in the Age of Enlightenment, Paris has been one of the world's major centres of finance, diplomacy, commerce, culture, fashion, and gastronomy since the 17th century.
